attributes.action: Cause the police to stop and check all lefthand drive vehicles headlights have beam deflectors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvioius that our, so called, continental friends do care to adjust or cover their lights to prevent them dazzling on comming traffic. I therefore call for the government to make all police forces stop lefthand drive foreign vehicles and if the lights are not adjusted for use in Britain declare them to be unroadworthy.
